meanings.definition: A benign tumor composed of adipose tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that lipomas are harmless growths made of fat.
meanings.sent2: She had surgery to remove the lipomas from her arm.
meanings.sent3: The lipomas in his body were like little fat balloons.
meanings.sent4: Her body was a garden, with lipomas blooming like fatty flowers.
meanings.sent5: The lipomas jiggled under the skin like soft marbles.
